name: Hiragana POW!
description:
Learn Japanese: The Hiragana

No beating around the bush, get straight into action and start learning the Hiragana.

A very small world to explore with 14 very small arena-like levels with varying difficulty and different creatures to beat up.

The combat system is very basic, to attack you must guess and hopefully learn eventually which Hiragana matches which transcription.

Start out by learning a few Hiragana in the first level and then new are introduced in each following level as the foes become stronger.

Learn at your own pace. You don't have to continue with new material until you feel ready.
